definitions.definition: The call to prayer , which consisted originally of simply four takbirs followed by the statement (أَشْهَدُ أَنْ) لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا ٱلله ( (ʔašhadu ʔan) lā ʔilāha ʔillā llāh ) .
examples: If one were to pray alone, then no adhan is needed.

main_definition: ( Islam ) The call to prayer , which consisted originally of simply four takbirs followed by the statement (أَشْهَدُ أَنْ) لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا ٱلله ( (ʔašhadu ʔan) lā ʔilāha ʔillā llāh ) .
